org.unc.lac.baboon.execution

Class DummyThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.unc.lac.baboon.execution.DummyThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Void>

    public class DummyThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Void>
    A Callable object that executes a AbstractTaskControllerSubscription. This is the wrapper of a thread that asks the Petri monitor for permission to execute a simple taskController, executes it and after sets the guard callback associated to this taskController. It repeats this process for all the simple taskControllers in the AbstractTaskControllerSubscription and finally, after the execution of the last taskController, fires the transition callback. After setting the callback, the thread starts the taskController execution process over again.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ariel Ivan Rabinovich, Juan Jose Arce Giacobbe

Repeats this process for all the simple taskControllers in the AbstractTaskControllerSubscription and finally, after the execution of the last taskController, fires the transition callback. After setting the callback, the thread starts the taskController execution process over again.
